import React ,{useState}from "react"; import { Modal, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './CurdOpration.css' const CurdEditChanges = ({ handleClose, show, }) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ userName: "", age: "", userNameError: "", ageError: "", UserData: [], updatedUserData: [], editModal: false, }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setState(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value, userNameError: "", ageError: "" })); } return ( <> { show && ( <> Edit
X
User Name : {state.userNameError}
Age : {state.ageError}
 ) } ) } export default CurdEditChanges;
